author: Alice Park
title: Why Children Seem To Be Less Affected By the Coronavirus
description: The data is still sparse, but it seems to suggest that children might have milder cases of COVID-19 infection.
content:
If there was one glimmer of hope among the alarming number of cases of COVID-19 in the past few months, it was that young children seemed to avoid more serious illness.
That trend, which doctors in China first reported, seems to be holding true in the US as … [+5931 chars]
